description: An Tuba pitched an octave higher than normal. The name Tuba Clarion has also been used as a synonym for Clarion Horn. See Clarion.
examplesDescription: Osiris contains about 50 examples of Tuba Clarion, all at 4' pitch, of which the earliest are listed below. Only one example of Octave Tuba is known.

examples.name: Tuba Clarion 4', Solo; Royal Albert Hall, London, England; Willis 1872.
Tuba Clarion 4', Solo; Town Hall, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia; Hill 1886-90.
Octave Tuba 4', Solo; Matropolitan Cathedral, Liverpool, England; Walker 1967.
